text: Abo babecinezelekile baya kuthi kwabo babekhukhumele: “Unotshe! Yayiliyelenqe (lenu) lasebusuku nasemini xa nanisiyalela ukuba singakholwa kuAllâh nokuba sayamanise amahlulelane kuYe.” Kodwa (bonke) baya kuthetha inyaniso omnye komnye xa besibona isohlwayo; Yaye Siya kufaka amakhamandela entsimbi ezintayeni zabo babengakholwa.
